attributes.action: ensure that petitions on this site permit and count votes both for and against the petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: High profile and controversial issues will attract more attention, and so more votes.  This will give a misleading impression of public opinion.  If all petitions allowed people to vote against the petition if they so wished, this bias would be corrected.

rejection.details: Please read the FAQ's at http://www.petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
